about.introduce_about: I'm a backend .NET Developer. If you're looking for a professional .NET web developer to build a website, refactor legacy code, or enhance your app's performance — you’re in the right place!
about.experience_about: 2+ years building .NET backend solutions with production-grade code
about.services: I can help you out with:
about.services2: Building backend systems with ASP.NET Core and Entity Framework Core
about.services3: Deploying and managing services in Azure
about.services4: Writing unit, integration, and acceptance tests
